data.access

Class ArcadoidData

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.access.ArcadoidData

  • public class ArcadoidData
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Arcadoid data object, in charge of giving access to the UI to all required data types.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie

        Get all games belonging to the given game platform.
        Parameters:
        platform - Platform for which a game list is requested.
        Returns:
        A list of games.

      • getAllGamesForNavigationItem

        Get all games matching given navigation item.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A list of games.

      • createNewGame

        public Game createNewGame()
        Creates a new Game object, by default for the MAME platform.
        Returns:
        A new Game object.

      • changeGamePlatform

        public Game changeGamePlatform(Game currentGame,
                               Game.Platform newPlatform)
        Changes the platform of the given game. The returned Game object is actually not the same object anymore, although it will keep the same identifier.
        Parameters:
        currentGame - Game that must be changed.
        newPlatform - Platform that must be used for the change.
        Returns:
        A new Game object specific to the new platform.

      • deleteGame

        public void deleteGame(Game game)
        Deletes given game from the game catalog.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        List of navigation items.

      • createNewNavigationItemWithParent

        public NavigationItem createNewNavigationItemWithParent(NavigationItem parent)
        Creates a new navigation item with given parent. If parent is null, the newly created item will be considered root.
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent of navigation item to create. May be null.
        Returns:
        The newly created navigation item.

      • deleteNavigationItem

        public void deleteNavigationItem(NavigationItem navigationItem)
        Deletes given navigation item from the game catalog.

      • setRootNavigationItems

        public void setRootNavigationItems(java.util.List<NavigationItem> rootItems)
        Overwrites current list of root navigation items.
        Parameters:
        rootItems - New list of root navigation items.

      • saveData

        public void saveData()
              throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                     java.io.IOException,
                     java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Saves all data to a serialized JSON file. Exceptions are forwarded from the DataPersitence layer.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • loadData

        public void loadData()
              throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                     java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                     java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.NullPointerException
        Reads the serialized JSON file and replace all current data with the parsed data. The highest used identifier is also updated after the load by checking all retrieved objects. Once loading is finished, the DATA_LOADED_NOTIFICATION notification is posted. Exceptions are forwarded from the DataPersistence layer.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException
